title: Performance Optimization: Techniques for Faster Web Applications

sections.title: Optimization Techniques
sections.markdown:
# Performance Optimization

Advanced techniques for optimizing web application performance, including code splitting, lazy loading, and modern caching strategies.

> "Performance is a feature."

[Web Performance Checklist](https://web.dev/performance/)

sections.title: Key Methods
sections.markdown:
## Methods

- Code splitting
- Lazy loading
- Caching

:::alert
**Tip:** Measure before you optimize!
:::

sections.title: Performance Table
sections.markdown:
### Optimization Techniques

| Technique      | Benefit         | Complexity |
|---------------|-----------------|------------|
| Code splitting| Faster loads    | Medium     |
| Lazy loading  | Less bandwidth  | Low        |
| Caching       | Quick response  | Medium     |

![Performance](https://deifkwefumgah.cloudfront.net/shadcnblocks/block/placeholder-dark-1.svg)

sections.title: Sample Code & Resources
sections.markdown:
#### Example: Dynamic Import

```js
const Comp = React.lazy(() => import('./Comp'))
```

- [React Performance](https://react.dev/learn/optimizing-performance)
- [Awesome Performance](https://github.com/davidsonfellipe/awesome-wpo)
